entry.title: Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces Large Custom Puzzle with large pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (4 variants)

Our Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces is a beautiful portrait puzzle.  Featuring very vibrant colors and thick board, this puzzle is absolutely stunning. Each piece in this Poster Size puzzle will measure approximately 2 x 2 inches, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches!  
 
A fantastic buy, this puzzle costs less than most single prints from a photographer.  Very affordable and a great value on a professional puzzle. Looks amazing framed.

entry.title: Custom Photo Wedding Guest Book Puzzle - Poster Size Puzzle Choose 150 or 200 Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 79.99 - 97.99 (8 variants)

Unique personalized picture puzzle for Wedding Guest Book for large weddings.

Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely stunning and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign.   This puzzle is beautifully printed in a professional-grade matte finish and is cut on a very thick 100% recycled board.  Be Earth-conscious and trendy.

A fantastic buy, this Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourages your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory. It also looks amazing framed!

Details: 

  • 200 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.
  • 150 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will have an average size of 2 x 2 inches each and a nice surface area for a few words and signature  The finished size will be approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.   

BEST RESULTS: This is a Gigantic Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. 

HAND NUMBERING OPTION:   We can hand-number the back of your puzzle in pencil, which saves a ton of time and significantly helps with assembly.  We recommend having your photo numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but not exact.  

We recommend using a medium point pen on our regular backing, which is a light color.

This is a Gigantic Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20x30 inches. We print what you send, so be sure to send a print-ready photo.

Recommendations:  We recommend having your photo numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but not exact.  We recommend using a medium point pen on our regular backing, which is a light color.

A fantastic buy, these Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourage your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory. Looks amazing framed!

entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: White Puzzle Pieces in a variety of piece counts. Approximately 16x20 inches when complete.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 29.99 - 38.49 (14 variants)

Our beautiful thick white puzzle pieces are plain white and quite the trend.  This all white puzzle will have an approximate finished size of 16 x 20 inches when complete which is the perfect size for framing.  These extra-large blank white puzzle pieces allow your event guests to have some fun while signing your guest book and will look amazing displayed.  You'll never have to throw your guest book in your closet again! 

Made in America with high-quality materials, our puzzle pieces are designed to last, are thick and can easily be signed.  Choose from the following piece counts (sizes are all approximate):  

  • 15 Pieces: The average piece size is 5 x 4 inches.
  • 30 Pieces: The average piece size is 3.5 x 3 inches.
  • 63 Pieces: The average piece size is 2.5 x 2.25 inches. 
  • 80 Pieces: The average piece size is 2 x 2 inches. 
  • 104 Piece: The average piece size is 2 x 1.5 inches. 

OPTIONS:

Hand-Numbering:  We offer hand-numbering on the back of the puzzle pieces as an option.  We will number the puzzle in pencil which will help with the assembly and save you tons of time.  We automatically hand number our 63, 80, and 104 pieces as they are very challenging to assemble and offer only this option for purchase. 

We also offer larger white puzzles in either 150 pieces or 200 pieces for large guest lists HERE.

entry.title: Wedding Cake Guest Book Puzzle - Guest Book Puzzle Cake
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 74.99 - 84.99 (4 variants)

Our unique Wedding Cake Shaped Guest Book Puzzle is exclusively our design.  Featuring Large size puzzle pieces with heart-shaped whimsies, this beautifully cut and easily assembled puzzle offers optional hand-numbering. 

Size:  The approximate finished size of this cake puzzle is 30 x 19 inches, which is very large.  Features 14 whimsy (special pieces, such as heart and bridal couple) and a total of 103 signable pieces.  We have added the template to the photos for ease of assembly.

Numbering:  We offer optional hand numbering in our shop.  We number on the back of each piece for ease of assembly.  We strongly recommend that you choose this option as this puzzle is very large and a bit challenging to assemble without expert puzzle skills and a bit of time!

Suggestions:  Your guests can sign this puzzle with either a ballpoint pen with a medium tip or with a Sharpie marker.  We recommend that you use only medium to thick-tipped writing instruments as puzzles to avoid puncturing the white layer on the puzzle.  Colorful sharpies look amazing on a finished puzzle.  Check out our blog for more suggestions.

entry.title: Cowboy Cowgirl Boot Guest Book Puzzle. Country Style Wedding Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Guest Book
Price: 79.99 - 89.99 (4 variants)

One of a kind Cowboy / Cowgirl Boot Jigsaw Puzzle for your Western Style Wedding. Our super Texas Sized puzzle features 66 extra Texas Sized Pieces for your guests to leave a wonderful message and well wishes.

Each piece supports a few sentences, some more! Covered in either a white or tan colored coating, this boot is exclusively our design. You won't see it elsewhere!

The finished size of the puzzle is a whopping 30 x 26 inches (approximately). Also features a Giant Heart shaped piece for those special someone's to leave their loving messages....

Our White Boot can be written on with either a medium ball point pen or medium tipped Sharpie markers (sold separately).

Our Tan Boot is vinyl, and can be written on with a medium ball point pen.

Not recommended for Sharpie type writing instruments, as they might smear.

entry.title: Extra Large Puzzle Pieces. Kids Puzzle with Big Pieces 15 pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 44.99 - 49.99 (2 variants)

The perfect puzzle for Babies and Toddlers!   Your child can piece together the important members of your family, one piece at a time.  This is a BIG puzzle with an approximate size of 16 x 20 inches and features extra-large puzzle pieces that are sturdy, durable, and designed to last. Each puzzle piece is approximately 4-5 inches in size and is thick.  The perfect puzzle for first time puzzlers.
 
Built for long wear from sturdy board, this puzzle can take a beating!  Shows amazing detail in photo's and can be made either landscape or portrait.  Fits into a standard size frame.  Absolutely adorable...a must-have for your young child.  THE PERFECT CHILDREN'S PUZZLE... Makes perfect baby gifts, baby announcements, grandparent presents and birth announcements.

entry.title: Will you be in my Wedding with choice of Optional Frame. Ask your attendants.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 6.99 - 11.99 (2 variants)

Ask your girls to be in your wedding with a puzzle.  A fun and unique way to ask your wedding party.  Our 6 piece puzzle is the perfect way to ask!  Add a name and your custom text (10 character limit).

Each puzzle has a finished size of approximately 4 x 6 inches and features thick puzzle pieces that are easily assembled.  Fun, exciting and memorable way to ask your ladies to be in your wedding.   Each puzzle is packaged in a clear resealable bag.  We keep the cost low, so order for your entire wedding party!   

*Be sure to include your text, whether Bridesmaid, Flower Girl, Maid of Honor or special text in order to speed the progress of the item.  Generally ships in days!

entry.title: Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle With 104 Pieces - A Fun Family Portrait Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 44.99 - 54.99 (4 variants)

Your photo on our Very Large Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle.     This beautiful custom puzzle features 104 very large puzzle pieces.  Measuring approximately 16" x 20" (inches) when assembled, this custom puzzle is a favorite among our customers for its extra-large puzzle pieces and professional look, as we print on a premium matte paper to create your beautiful puzzle.

The large pieces in this completely personalized puzzle show great detail in the puzzle pieces and look amazing framed. Our 104 piece puzzle is perfect for Family Portraits and Alzheimer's and Dementia patients.    

If you are looking for a gift for the hard to buy for person, look no further.  This personalized photo puzzle makes an unbelievable Birthday, Anniversary, Graduation, Special Occasion gift, or a gift for Seniors.  This puzzle has also been used for the visually impaired, as the puzzle pieces are extra large.

*Have been used with Alzheimer's therapy patients for family recognition.*  The absolute perfect custom jigsaw puzzle with unlimited possibilities.

For information on Alzheimer's and Dementia puzzle recommendations, please see our article HERE.

If you need help with your questions about your photo resolution, we have an easy-to-use chart HERE.

entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding

Our custom photo puzzles are the perfect way to tell your story and preserve memories. Our puzzle pieces are large, high-quality, and easy for little hands to handle. We can create a custom puzzle for any occasion.

This beautiful and large 80 piece puzzle features large puzzle pieces that capture memories.  Having an average size of 2 x 2 inches each, this puzzle has an approximate finished size of 16 x 20 inches when complete.  Thick durable puzzle pieces on a professional matte finish for a stunning puzzle of YOU.

entry.title: LARGE Puzzle Guest Book with 150 or 200 Blank Puzzle Pieces. Extra Large Blank White Puzzle Pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 59.99 - 67.99 (4 variants)

Our beautiful puzzle guest book features thick, vibrant, and generously sized puzzle pieces for your large Wedding or event.   This extra-large puzzle is Poster Size when assembled (20 x 30 inches)  and is a fantastic Guest Book Alternative that provides amply sized pieces for your guests to sign.  Each piece has an average size of 1.5 x 2 inches (200 piece puzzle) or 2 x 2 inches (150 Piece Puzzle, which is perfect for a very brief message and signature.  A fantastic buy, this puzzle costs less than most single prints from a photographer. 

Very affordable and a super value on a professional puzzle.  This puzzle looks amazing when framed and will never sit in your closet!  We automatically number the back of our 150 and 200 piece white puzzles for ease of assembly. 

We also offer this puzzle with a photo option!  Check out our listing for our 20 x 30 inch puzzle.  

SUGGESTIONS FOR WRITING ON YOUR PUZZLE:  We recommend that you use medium point pens to write on the puzzle pieces or thicker Sharpie type markers.  Multi-Colored Sharpies look amazing when complete.

*Gel pens and fine point instruments are not recommended as the puzzle is porous and they may poke through.

entry.title: Butterfly Shaped Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Butterfly Shaped Puzzle
Price: 79.99 - 89.99 (4 variants)

Our Extra Large Butterfly puzzle is an all-white puzzle and is unique. Measuring approximately 30 x 25.5 inches when assembled, this XL white puzzle features several specialty pieces for those extra special messages from family.  Great unique Guest Book for Sweet 16 Party and Autism Awareness events.

Over 100 extra-large pieces form this puzzle (108 pieces). Each piece of the puzzle easily supports a brief message and signature and looks incredible when completed.

Very unique and beautiful, affordable and a must-have. 

OPTIONS:

We offer the option to HAND-NUMBER the pieces on the back of the puzzle.  This option significantly cuts down assembly time and is recommended for this puzzle, as the pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but are not exact.

entry.title: Photo Puzzle with 63 Extra Large Pieces - The perfect Guest Book Puzzle

The perfect Guest Book or Children's puzzle. This 63 piece puzzle is perfect for young children or adults who want to show detail in their pictures or are just learning how to piece it all together.  Generous sized pieces make it easy to work with, while providing the detail needed to preserve cherished memories.  Each piece, on average, measures approximately 2.25x 2.25 inches (on average).  Finished size will be approximately 16x20 inches.  PHOTO IS OF A 63 PIECE PUZZLE.
 
This puzzle has also been used in Weddings as a Wedding Guest Book to complete the pieces of the puzzle, where guests sign each generous sized piece to finish off the perfect day!  A wonderful way to remember your Wedding Day.  Makes the perfect unique gift idea for the hard to buy for person.
